about.specializationText: Product and Project Manager with FinTech experience. I lead cross-functional teams, implement innovations, and optimize business processes.
about.approachText: Deep knowledge in data analysis, Agile, and PMBOK. Successfully build interaction processes between departments, ensuring engagement and transparency.
about.goalsText: Seeking growth opportunities in an innovative company where I can apply my skills to achieve ambitious business goals and bring significant value to product strategy.

rts.title: OTC System
rts.quote: Danila demonstrated outstanding project management skills, successfully restructured the team, and brought processes to a new level of efficiency. His contribution to budget optimization was key for us.
rts.author: — Head of OTC Market, NP RTS

tinkoffEdu.title: Education Projects (T-Bank)
tinkoffEdu.quote: Training programs developed jointly with Danila became a quality standard in our department. He knows how to approach the team and turn learning into an interesting and useful process.
tinkoffEdu.author: — Head of Education, T-Bank

privateInvest.title: Private Invest Back-Office (T-Bank)
privateInvest.quote: Thanks to Danila's initiative to optimize back-office operations, we were able to significantly speed up technical problem resolution. His analytical mindset and ability to work with logs were indispensable.
privateInvest.author: — Head of Private Invest Group, T-Bank

rts.title: NP RTS Association
items: Led a project to transfer key services to in-house development.
Initiated and launched new products based on the OTC system.
Managed budget, controlled timelines and quality, coordinated stakeholders.
Created and implemented a single point of access to market data.

tbank.title: T-Bank
items: Developed and implemented digital training programs for staff.
Managed a portfolio of premium clients, participated in launching new products.
Optimized internal processes, implemented a structured knowledge base.
Created a mentoring system for new employees and fostered a learning culture.
